body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Sanchez Auto Sales. My name is Timothy Sanchez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Grace. Can you please provide your date of birth as DD MM YYYY?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero four zero seven one nine eight eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Grace. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help, I feel relieved.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Grace. Thank you for contacting us. Have a wonderful day!
